title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This responsive website showcases my skills, projects, and achievements.

title: Guess Who's the Thief
description: A team project combining OpenAI's GPT with JavaFX for a detective-style game. Players interact with AI-powered NPCs and analyze evidence through a dynamic Java-based backend and prompt engineering techniques.

title: WaterMark Removal Tool
description: A cross-platform tool to remove watermarks from PDF and Word documents with ease. Supports batch processing and customizable removal modes.

title: JavaScript Amazon Project
description: A simplified e-commerce web application inspired by Amazon, built using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Features product browsing, dynamic search bar with dropdown suggestions, interactive shopping cart, and responsive design.

title: Odds and Evens Hand Game
description: A simple hand game implemented in Java where a human player faces off against an AI named HAL-9000. The game combines elements of chance and psychology, as the AI attempts to learn the behavior of the human player and predict their moves.

title: Risk Map Project
description: A strategic board game where players can simulate territorial expansion and conflict. The game models the map as a graph with countries as nodes and edges representing neighboring relations.
